attributes.action: Grant a medal to ex-SAS Major John Wick for his role in revealing MPs expenses sleaze; to grant the whistleblower immunity from prosecution and to reimburse the Telegraph it's costs relating buying the Whistleblower's information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the Freedom of Information Act failed to enable the disclosure of MPs expenses corruption. Mainly this was the result of the dishonourable and improper actions of Mr Speaker Martin in covering up the disgrace. Without Major Wicks, the Daily Telegraph and the whistle-blower all of this would have been "swept under the rug": these civic minded people should reap the reward of a grateful country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
